review:
I had the pleasure of being treated by Dr. Meha for severe heavy bleeding, and I am thoroughly impressed with her care and expertise. From the initial consultation, Dr. Meha displayed a deep understanding of my condition and took the time to explain the underlying causes and treatment options available.

Her approach was both professional and compassionate. She thoroughly investigated my symptoms, recommended appropriate tests, and tailored a treatment plan that addressed my specific needs. Dr. Meha's ability to communicate complex medical information in an understandable way made me feel confident and well-informed throughout the process.

Under her care, my symptoms were effectively managed, and I experienced significant relief. Dr. Meha's dedication to finding the best solution for my condition and her attentive follow-up care were truly commendable. I highly recommend Dr. Meha to anyone struggling with heavy bleeding; her expertise and empathetic approach make her an outstanding choice for gynecological care.

I have consulted Dr. Meha many times now and every time she has diagnosed and recommended the best course of action for my issues. She believes in conservative approach and advises intervention as the last resort. She is extremely gentle,  understanding, and patient. She always gives the best treatment. I am very happy and grateful to  have found such a brilliant doctor.  I would recommend her  to everyone. Thank you Dr. Meha for everything.

Dr. Meha is an incredible doctor who goes above and beyond. Her patience and calm demeanor make every visit comforting. She truly listens to every concern I have and makes me feel heard. She's not just a doctor to me, she's like a guardian angel. I'm so grateful for her care and expertise. Thank you, Dr. Meha for being such a wonderful doctor!

I went to the doctor for post menopausal symptoms, she was very patient and listened to everything and gave me correct treatment after which I felt a lot better. I had visited many other doctors but they could not diagnose my symptoms and was not given effective treatment. Thank you so much.
